sn22.88:1.1: Ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā rājagahe viharati veḷuvane kalandakanivāpe.
sn22.88:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmā assaji kassapakārāme viharati ābādhiko dukkhito bāḷhagilāno.
sn22.88:1.3: Atha kho āyasmā assaji upaṭṭhāke āmantesi:
sn22.88:1.4: “etha tumhe, āvuso, yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamatha; upasaṅkamitvā mama vacanena bhagavato pāde sirasā vandatha:
sn22.88:1.8: ‘sādhu kira, bhante, bhagavā yena assaji bhikkhu tenupasaṅkamatu anukampaṃ upādāyā’”ti.
sn22.88:1.9: “Evamāvuso”ti kho te bhikkhū āyasmato assajissa paṭissutvā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṃsu; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdiṃsu. Ekamantaṃ nisinnā kho te bhikkhū bhagavantaṃ etadavocuṃ:
sn22.88:1.11: sādhu kira, bhante, bhagavā yena assaji bhikkhu tenupasaṅkamatu anukampaṃ upādāyā”ti.
sn22.88:2.1: Atha kho bhagavā sāyanhasamayaṃ paṭisallānā vuṭṭhito yenāyasmā assaji tenupasaṅkami.
sn22.88:2.2: Addasā kho āyasmā assaji bhagavantaṃ dūratova āgacchantaṃ.
sn22.88:2.4: Atha kho bhagavā āyasmantaṃ assajiṃ etadavoca:
sn22.88:2.7: Nisīdi bhagavā paññatte āsane. Nisajja kho bhagavā āyasmantaṃ assajiṃ etadavoca:
sn22.88:2.8: “kacci te, assaji, khamanīyaṃ, kacci yāpanīyaṃ …pe… paṭikkamosānaṃ paññāyati no abhikkamo”ti?
sn22.88:3.1: “Na me, bhante, khamanīyaṃ …pe… abhikkamosānaṃ paññāyati no paṭikkamo”ti.
sn22.88:3.2: “Kacci te, assaji, na kiñci kukkuccaṃ na koci vippaṭisāro”ti?
sn22.88:3.3: “Taggha me, bhante, anappakaṃ kukkuccaṃ anappako vippaṭisāro”ti.
sn22.88:3.4: “Kacci pana taṃ, assaji, attā sīlato na upavadatī”ti?
sn22.88:3.5: “Na kho maṃ, bhante, attā sīlato upavadatī”ti.
sn22.88:3.6: “No ce kira taṃ, assaji, attā sīlato upavadati, atha kiñca te kukkuccaṃ ko ca vippaṭisāro”ti?
sn22.88:3.7: “Pubbe khvāhaṃ, bhante, gelaññe passambhetvā passambhetvā kāyasaṅkhāre viharāmi, sohaṃ samādhiṃ nappaṭilabhāmi.
sn22.88:3.8: Tassa mayhaṃ, bhante, taṃ samādhiṃ appaṭilabhato evaṃ hoti:
sn22.88:3.10: “Ye te, assaji, samaṇabrāhmaṇā samādhisārakā samādhisāmaññā tesaṃ taṃ samādhiṃ appaṭilabhataṃ evaṃ hoti:
sn22.88:4.8: So sukhañce vedanaṃ vedayati, sā ‘aniccā’ti pajānāti. ‘Anajjhositā’ti pajānāti. ‘Anabhinanditā’ti pajānāti.
sn22.88:4.9: Dukkhañce vedanaṃ vedayati, sā ‘aniccā’ti pajānāti. ‘Anajjhositā’ti pajānāti. ‘Anabhinanditā’ti pajānāti.
sn22.88:4.10: Adukkhamasukhañce vedanaṃ vedayati, sā ‘aniccā’ti pajānāti …pe… ‘anabhinanditā’ti pajānāti.
sn22.88:4.11: So sukhañce vedanaṃ vedayati, visaṃyutto naṃ vedayati;
sn22.88:4.12: dukkhañce vedanaṃ vedayati, visaṃyutto naṃ vedayati;
sn22.88:4.13: adukkhamasukhañce vedanaṃ vedayati, visaṃyutto naṃ vedayati.
sn22.88:4.14: So kāyapariyantikañce vedanaṃ vedayamāno ‘kāyapariyantikaṃ vedanaṃ vedayāmī’ti pajānāti. Jīvitapariyantikañce vedanaṃ vedayamāno ‘jīvitapariyantikaṃ vedanaṃ vedayāmī’ti pajānāti.
sn22.88:4.15: ‘Kāyassa bhedā uddhaṃ jīvitapariyādānā idheva sabbavedayitāni anabhinanditāni sītībhavissantī’ti pajānāti.
sn22.88:5.1: Seyyathāpi, assaji, telañca paṭicca, vaṭṭiñca paṭicca, telappadīpo jhāyeyya;
sn22.88:5.2: tasseva telassa ca vaṭṭiyā ca pariyādānā anāhāro nibbāyeyya.
sn22.88:5.3: Evameva kho, assaji, bhikkhu kāyapariyantikaṃ vedanaṃ vedayamāno ‘kāyapariyantikaṃ vedanaṃ vedayāmī’ti pajānāti. Jīvitapariyantikaṃ vedanaṃ vedayamāno ‘jīvitapariyantikaṃ vedanaṃ vedayāmī’ti pajānāti.
sn22.88:5.4: ‘Kāyassa bhedā uddhaṃ jīvitapariyādānā idheva sabbavedayitāni anabhinanditāni sītībhavissantī’ti pajānātī”ti.
